title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
created_time: May 19, 2022, 03:44:00 PMLast edit: May 16, 2023, 07:35:52 PM by Little Mouse
content: Note: I'm not affiliated with the project directly, nor I'm team member. I have been hired by Jumbo Ticket to post this ANN thread only.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk. They do have huge jackpot ranging from 100k to $1M. Who wouldn't be lured with that.But as I was about to register right in the fill up page, it already asked my phone number and its a mandatory. Are we able to bet the welcom bonus and withdraw the coins we won?

comments.author: Raflesia
comments.body: Welcome to this forum it is very interesting for me to see in it.I just registered on this platform and filled in all the required data on it, after it was finished I didn't receive an email for verification, I checked the spam folder and it wasn't there, was it too late to send a verification email or was there a slight problem?So I interested it with a high lottery prize rate.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on May 19, 2022, 03:44:00 PM<snip>Purely for raffles right? Rarely see that, but I believe it is a consistent profit for the business. How long is this business up? How do you determine winners?You're asking for the user's full name for the registration, should this be a real one? How about the withdrawal, will you ask if a user requested one?The site's design is really good.

comments.author: MArsland
comments.body: Even though the offer is very extraordinary, to be honest, I still refrain from providing personal data that is so very transparent. Telephone number and full name. It will be quite difficult for me personally in this case. Based on what I understand so far to participate do we need to buy some tickets or just simply register and then be given $50 to buy the tickets?

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: I never used this JumboTicket, but I think that I will add this gambling website to my list of lotteries that accept Bitcoin for payments.One thing that I don't like is that during registration I have to enter my phone number and probably do some kind of verification later.update:I notice some red flags and I wrote about them more in my topic:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5278167.msg60175912#msg60175912

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: LM, I suggest making the image link to jumbloticket website. I saw the "Register Now" at the bottom of the image and naively clicked on it thinking it will take me to the registration page  I have one question for the moment regarding the names of the latest winners: are the names on the list the winners' real names or just nicknames? I wish an official representative will answer this question.

comments.author: Jumbo Ticket
comments.created_time: May 19, 2022, 07:59:57 PMLast edit: May 19, 2022, 10:02:37 PM by Mr. Big
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on May 19, 2022, 04:08:51 PMWelcome to bitcointalk. They do have huge jackpot ranging from 100k to $1M. Who wouldn't be lured with that.But as I was about to register right in the fill up page, it already asked my phone number and its a mandatory. Are we able to bet the welcom bonus and withdraw the coins we won?Hi, Thanks for showing interest in Jumbo Ticket. Phone number is mandatory to enhance our users security and to fight spam. You can use the $50 welcome bonus to purchase tickets for our three Jackpots. Yes, you can also withdraw the winnings to your crypto wallet. We allow Bitcoin, Etherium, USDT (TRC20), USDT (ERC20), XRP, Dogecoin, Tron, Binance, Litecoin and BUSD for the payment / withdrawal process. Quote from: khaled0111 on May 19, 2022, 07:28:40 PMLM, I suggest making the image link to jumbloticket website. I saw the "Register Now" at the bottom of the image and naively clicked on it thinking it will take me to the registration page  I have one question for the moment regarding the names of the latest winners: are the names on the list the winners' real names or just nicknames? I wish an official representative will answer this question. All the names on the winners list are real. Those are the names using which our users have registered on our platform.Quote from: notblox1 on May 19, 2022, 07:22:50 PMI never used this JumboTicket, but I think that I will add this gambling website to my list of lotteries that accept Bitcoin for payments.One thing that I don't like is that during registration I have to enter my phone number and probably do some kind of verification later.update:I notice some red flags and I wrote about them more in my topic:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5278167.msg60175912#msg60175912The countries that are mentioned in the winners list are the ones that our users selected while registering with us. There is a possibility they might have used a different identity and details to preserve their anonymity. We suggest that you register with us, purchase tickets from us and participate in our live draws. Our process is completely transparent. Once you participate and witness the process, we are sure that you will appreciate our transparency. We hope that you become a happy member of our Jumbo Ticket family. Quote from: Raflesia on May 19, 2022, 04:30:46 PMWelcome to this forum it is very interesting for me to see in it.I just registered on this platform and filled in all the required data on it, after it was finished I didn't receive an email for verification, I checked the spam folder and it wasn't there, was it too late to send a verification email or was there a slight problem?So I interested it with a high lottery prize rate.Please check the promotions tab to see the verification email.Quote from: naira on May 19, 2022, 07:16:23 PMEven though the offer is very extraordinary, to be honest, I still refrain from providing personal data that is so very transparent. Telephone number and full name. It will be quite difficult for me personally in this case. Based on what I understand so far to participate do we need to buy some tickets or just simply register and then be given $50 to buy the tickets?Hi, Thanks for showing interest in Jumbo Ticket. Phone number is mandatory to enhance our users security and to fight spam.You can use the $50 welcome bonus to purchase tickets for our three Jackpots.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: Jumbo Ticket on May 19, 2022, 08:17:43 PMThe countries that are mentioned in the winners list are the ones that our users selected while registering with us. There is a possibility they might have used a different identity and details to preserve their anonymity. We suggest that you register with us, purchase tickets from us and participate in our live draws. Our process is completely transparent. Once you participate and witness the process, we are sure that you will appreciate our transparency. We hope that you become a happy member of our Jumbo Ticket family. Don't write several posts one after another, but joined them all in one post, instead of breaking forum rules.Your excuse is bad, because they all used generic english names and for registration they needed to use phone numbers from those countries.Sorry but I won't purchase anything from your website and I won't registered after I saw list of alleged winners

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Only 75 winners every Month? I don’t know how much is the odds for you to win on this one but its looks exciting, I just hesitant to try since it ask for some personal details. Well, welcome to the forum Jumboticket and its good to see that you hire a great manager to handle this project, hope to see more good updates and maybe I can try this later on.

comments.author: Jumbo Ticket
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on May 19, 2022, 08:33:54 PMQuote from: Jumbo Ticket on May 19, 2022, 08:17:43 PMThe countries that are mentioned in the winners list are the ones that our users selected while registering with us. There is a possibility they might have used a different identity and details to preserve their anonymity. We suggest that you register with us, purchase tickets from us and participate in our live draws. Our process is completely transparent. Once you participate and witness the process, we are sure that you will appreciate our transparency. We hope that you become a happy member of our Jumbo Ticket family. Don't write several posts one after another, but joined them all in one post, instead of breaking forum rules.Your excuse is bad, because they all used generic english names and for registration they needed to use phone numbers from those countries.Sorry but I won't purchase anything from your website and I won't registered after I saw list of alleged winners  For registration, we provide an option to sign up using Google. Phone number is not mandatory for Google Sign ups. If you are interested, you can register and have a look at our platform. The choice is yours and we respect your decision. Cheers!!!

comments.author: Jumbo Ticket
comments.body: Quote from: Johnyz on May 19, 2022, 08:49:13 PMOnly 75 winners every Month? I don’t know how much is the odds for you to win on this one but its looks exciting, I just hesitant to try since it ask for some personal details. Well, welcome to the forum Jumboticket and its good to see that you hire a great manager to handle this project, hope to see more good updates and maybe I can try this later on.The phone number verification is mandatory only in the $50 bonus offer. We have taken this step to ensure the offer reaches the right people and to fight spam. If you are not interested to give your personal details, you can visit https://jumboticket.com/register and use the option of Google Signup where phone number is not mandatory.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: I am a bit disappointed how the winners are chosen when I watched one of your "live" draws. I know it's a lottery but I didn't expect to see the traditional method of spinning and host picking random tickets. I was expecting a more scientific way to be honest.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Quote from: Jumbo Ticket on May 19, 2022, 08:06:27 PMAll the names on the winners list are real. Those are the names using which our users have registered on our platform.Thank you for taking the time to answer my question.The reason why asked that question is because I saw winners from countries am very familiar with and am pretty sure people there never use such names which raised my suspicion! Quote from: Jumbo Ticket on May 19, 2022, 08:17:43 PMThe countries that are mentioned in the winners list are the ones that our users selected while registering with us. There is a possibility they might have used a different identity and details to preserve their anonymity.Does this mean you do not request kyc? That's interesting knowing you pay high winnings up to $1M!!

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Quote from: Jumbo Ticket on May 19, 2022, 09:00:07 PMThe phone number verification is mandatory only in the $50 bonus offer. We have taken this step to ensure the offer reaches the right people and to fight spam. If you are not interested to give your personal details, you can visit https://jumboticket.com/register and use the option of Google Signup where phone number is not mandatory.It’s good to know this and I will also try this site and don’t mind with the phone number, will try to get that bonus offer while still here and start trying the site. Lottery seems more fun to me despite of its probability, if I got lucky I know I can get paid on this site. Anyway, welcome and I do look forward for your market campaign here in the forum.

comments.author: stomachgrowls
comments.body: Quote from: Yogee on May 19, 2022, 09:43:01 PMI am a bit disappointed how the winners are chosen when I watched one of your "live" draws. I know it's a lottery but I didn't expect to see the traditional method of spinning and host picking random tickets. I was expecting a more scientific way to be honest.So you do really like to see something new? Like digital random number generator or something like that rather than with spinning? I do see for it to be considerable as long it would be fair and there's no rigging that would really affect those spins or choosing which it is really much preferred on having that kind of transparency to ensure fairness. Having 20-25 winners on each category or prize poolreally really that something new where usually lotteries do only have 1 winner but since there are some consolations then it might really be getting some attention.

comments.author: Wind_FURY
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, Jumbo Ticket. I believe during a bear market, if there will truly be a bear market, it's debatable until the end of June/end of Q2, a lottery is the most perfect and profitable form of gambling to operate. People simply become more unwilling to take risks/gamble, and would risk only small. OP, does Jumbo Ticket have an account in the forum? Please post profile link of Jumbo Ticket's Bitcointalk account.QuoteKYC / AMLJumboTicket reserves the right, at any time, to ask for any KYC/AML documentation it deems necessary to determine the identity and location of a User. JumboTicket reserves the right to restrict service and payment until identity is sufficiently determined.https://jumboticket.com/terms-and-conditionsWhat will cause, and when will Jumbo Ticket start asking for KYC, and is this true for ALL first time withdrawals?

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Like the other users above, I don't like the site that ask to fulfill the phone number in order to sign up. The site claiming to offer anonymous privilege, but asking phone number and mandatory KYC on the TOS are contradicts with the anonymous! Another thing is, we're only see the winners with the ticket number, it's possible if the site including the transaction hash too? To make sure the site is really pay to the winners.Quote from: Wind_FURY on May 20, 2022, 07:10:17 AMOP, does Jumbo Ticket have an account in the forum? Please post profile link of Jumbo Ticket's Bitcointalk account.Lol, you don't even read the other replies first? especially this thread is really new and only have 1 page.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Providing phone number is not the kind of site I wanted to sign up. I have enough troubles with my phone number receiving many messages that i'm surely that it is a scam. I even received a call from a number that when I check it came from Washington dc which I am sure I didn't get my number on any site that is on Washington dc. Anyway, welcome to the forum and by the way, does the owner of jumbo plan to have forum account for answering questions?. That would be a good start for them since many will be asking questions and as far as I know you are only hired just to post an ann thread.

comments.author: Wind_FURY
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on May 20, 2022, 07:21:58 AMLike the other users above, I don't like the site that ask to fulfill the phone number in order to sign up. The site claiming to offer anonymous privilege, but asking phone number and mandatory KYC on the TOS are contradicts with the anonymous! Another thing is, we're only see the winners with the ticket number, it's possible if the site including the transaction hash too? To make sure the site is really pay to the winners.Transaction hash from your wallet to the lottery site? I believe that should be the right of the user if he/she wants that information known to the public or not if he/she won. It can always be used nonetheless if the site does not pay.QuoteQuote from: Wind_FURY on May 20, 2022, 07:10:17 AMOP, does Jumbo Ticket have an account in the forum? Please post profile link of Jumbo Ticket's Bitcointalk account.Lol, you don't even read the other replies first? especially this thread is really new and only have 1 page.I honestly didn't. I read the first two replies, then posted. I believe a profile link for Jumbo Ticket's Bitcointalk account should still be posted in the OP, just to let everyone know officially that it's the real account.
